item.title: EA Sports WRC - Season 5 Reveal Trailer
item.description: Racing game EA Sports WRC reveals the content planned for Season 5, including fast new rides, the introduction of the Rally Pass, and new the Daily Moments feature.

item.title: Fortniteâ€™s Magneto Skin Continues an Impressive Run For The Popular Mutant
item.description:
Highlights

  • Magneto, with his complex motivations, challenges fans' beliefs and stands out among Marvel villains.
  • Magneto's recent surge in popularity includes appearances in X-Men '97, Marvel Rivals, and Fortnite.
  • Magneto's future in the Marvel universe looks bright, with potential roles in upcoming games like Insomniac's Wolverine and X-Men.

The Marvel universe is filled with iconic characters, many of whom have only grown more popular with age thanks to new comic runs, movies, TV shows, and video game adaptations. The X-Men alone are packed to the brim with household names, and Magneto is the perfect example of a character who's only grown more popular over time, so much so that he's about to make his Fortnite debut.

First introduced all the way back in 1963's The X-Men #1 , Magneto has been an adversary of the beloved superhero team since its conception. But while many Marvel villains of the time were rather simple evil archetypes, Magneto was made with the express purpose of challenging readers' beliefs, presenting a more complex adversary whose motivations are often very understandable. This complexity has been something that's set Magneto apart from the rest of the Marvel rogues gallery for decades now, and recently he's been getting the flowers he rightly deserves. Magneto is on a hot streak right now, one that's carried him all the way to Fortnite .

Magneto Remains An Iconic Face of Marvel in Gaming and Beyond

Magneto's On a Hot Streak

Back in March, Disney began to air X-Men '97 , a long-awaited sequel to the classic X-Men: The Animated Series that originally premiered back in 1992. A 10-episode season, X-Men '97 is now regarded by many to be one of the best adaptations of the superhero team ever made, featuring some incredibly complex and mature arcs, along with some of the best depictions of these iconic characters. Magneto is one such character. Voiced by Matthew Waterson, X-Men '97 's Magneto is charming, intimidating, and most importantly, understandable, leading to a very compelling performance and portrayal.

While X-Men '97 was airing, the 6v6 hero shooter Marvel Rivals was also undergoing its Alpha testing phase, where a select few got to play an early version of the multiplayer game. Playing very similarly to Overwatch , Marvel Rivals gives players an array of heroes and villains to choose from, each equipped with their own unique abilities and attacks. Donning the role of a Vanguard (Tank), Marvel Rivals ' Magneto is a true force to be reckoned with in the arena, capable of launching metallic meteors and blocking oncoming projectiles with a literal iron curtain. Marvel Rivals ' Magneto also boasts a powerful visual design, wearing bulky metallic armor that immediately conveys just how strong his abilities are.

Rounding out the character's hot streak, Magneto is also set to come to Fortnite very soon. A prominent part of this season's marketing, Magneto will appear in Fortnite Chapter 5 Season 3 as the Battle Pass' secret skin. This means that players won't be able to unlock the Magneto skin until July, but when they do, it'll also come with a LEGO variant of the post-apocalypse-inspired skin.

Magneto's Reign May Only Be Beginning

But Magneto's current hot streak might not be over just yet. Though it hasn't been confirmed yet, it's possible Magneto will play some sort of role in Insomniac's upcoming Marvel's Wolverine , whether it's as a prominent part of the game's story, or simply as a character who's referenced in some Easter eggs. Magneto's potential role in Wolverine could then pave the way for another appearance in the rumored Insomniac X-Men game, where he'd likely play a much larger role. Regardless of whether he appears in Insomniac's Marvel universe or not, Magneto's future as an X-Men icon seems brighter than ever.

item.title: SteamWorld Heist 2 - Extended Gameplay Trailer
item.description: SteamWorld Heist 2 Art Director Brandt Andrist gives an extended look at the upcoming tactical game, showing off the upgrade system, turn-based combat, and more.

item.title: Netflix Reveals 14 New Games Coming This Summer
item.description:
Highlights

  • Netflix will introduce 14 new games to its streaming service this summer, offering a variety of genres to subscribers.
  • Popular titles like Don't Starve Together and new additions like Tales of the Shire are on the list.
  • Netflix Games aims to compete with other gaming subscriptions, making gaming more accessible for fans on mobile devices.

Streaming giant Netflix has announced a summer slate of 14 new games coming to its Netflix Games service. The lineup includes a number of highly popular titles and upcoming video game releases, giving subscribers a fun variety of new gaming experiences to enjoy on Netflix.

Best-known as a frontrunner in the movie and television streaming space, Netflix has recently implemented the brand-new Netflix Games service, which allows its subscribers to play a number of video games via the Netflix app. While the service is still being rolled out in various countries and remains in a "testing" phase, users can look forward to a number of exciting new releases for the streamer's gaming library this summer.

Netflix has released an official trailer confirming 14 more games coming to its gaming service in the next few months. Familiar titles including Don't Starve Together , The Case of the Golden Idol , and Rotwood are among the lineup, along with several new entries in the Netflix Stories series, featuring games based on popular Netflix original series like Selling Sunset , Emily in Paris , and Perfect Match . Many of the games have been given release dates, though others have been marked as "coming soon" or given a broader summer release window. Netflix has already added several big-name titles to its gaming library, such as Hades , Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas , and Dead Cells , among others. As AAA game companies like Microsoft and Sony work to balance physical releases with video game subscription services, Netflix looks to be expanding its existing online offerings by entering the gaming fray.

Netflix Games Summer 2024 New Additions

  • Netflix Stories: Perfect Match (June 6)
  • The Case of the Golden Idol (June 11)
  • Hearts (June 18)
  • Cozy Grove: Camp Spirit (June 25)
  • Too Hot to Handle 3 (July 23)
  • The Dragon Prince: Xadia (July 30)
  • Arranger: A Role-Playing Adventure (Summer 2024)
  • Don't Starve Together (Coming Soon)
  • Harmonium: The Musical (Coming Soon)
  • Lab Rat (Coming Soon)
  • Netflix Stories: Emily in Paris (Coming Soon)
  • Netflix Stories: Selling Sunset (Coming Soon)
  • Tales of the Shire (Coming Soon)
  • Rotwood (Coming Soon)

Fans can look forward to a number of surprising additions to Netflix Games this summer, with dating sims, point-and-click mystery, action-adventure, survival, and card games among the array of upcoming additions. Perhaps most surprising are the unreleased games, such as Tales of the Shire and Lab Rats , that are already slated to be launched on Netflix Games, indicating that they may be available to Netflix subscribers at a similar time to their release on other platforms. Whether Netflix Games will prove to be a competitor against the massive library of Xbox Game Pass or the growing popularity of PS Plus remains to be seen, but competition among big companies is likely to benefit consumers in the long run.

Being able to enjoy a number of fun games on a mobile device without having to purchase additional hardware, such as a console or PC, makes gaming more accessible. In spite of some audiences remaining skeptical about the value of gaming subscription services, it is promising to see an entertainment powerhouse such as Netflix branching out to offer new opportunities to gaming fans.

item.title: Star Wars Hunters - Welcome to the Arena Seaon 1 Trailer
item.description: Free-to-play competitive arena game Star Wars Hunters reveals its season 1 content, including cosmetic bundles and rewards.
